section.p: You untie the little creature from its bonds. It gives a jubilant cry, and soars upwards.
‘Thank you, large one!’ it chatters, ‘My name is Pikalik the Wing-warrior! We never forget - one day I will pay my debt.’ With that, he flitters away into the clouds.
‘That’s 75 Shards you just let fly away,’ comments the man in the palanquin wryly, ‘Mannekyn People can’t be trusted, believe me.’
You leave the slave market. Acquire the codeword Altruist and .
